alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Charles; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 11:54PM CDT until July 02 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... East central Franklin County in east central Missouri... West central St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Augusta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Washington, MO AWOS gusted to 59 mmph with this storm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, St. Peters, Chesterfield, Wildwood, Ballwin, Maryland Heights, Manchester, Washington, Dardenne Prairie, Town and Country, Ellisville, Valley Park, Weldon Spring, Clarkson Valley, Spirit of St. Louis Airport, Winchester, New Melle, Twin Oaks, Augusta, and Weldon Spring Heights. This also includes Babler Memorial State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
